scripts.build: yarn --cwd packages/common build && yarn --cwd packages/serverless build && yarn --cwd packages/web build
scripts.start: docker-compose up --no-start && concurrently -p "[{name}]" -c "grey.bold" -n "Docker,Generate,Build Common,Serverless,Mobile,Web" "docker-compose up" "sleep 8 && yarn generate --watch" "yarn --cwd packages/common watch" "yarn --cwd packages/serverless start" "yarn --cwd packages/mobile start --non-interactive" "sleep 8 && BROWSER=none yarn --cwd packages/web start"
scripts.test: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -c "grey.bold" -n "Serverless,Mobile,Web" "yarn --cwd packages/serverless test --ci --watchAll=false" "yarn --cwd packages/mobile test --ci --watchAll=false" "yarn --cwd packages/web test --ci --watchAll=false"
